Author: roastedpepper
Text: For me it kinda went away when I was recovered, like it was just a passing intrusive thought but I didn’t pay attention to it or give it any power. It’s just flowed on by. So it didn’t disappear, but it didn’t matter. But I also think it’s a part of the reason why it’s so easy to relapse. I agree, once you have that “skill” it doesn’t disappear.

Author: daintyyeo
Text: the estimating calories part never goes away. made me question if recovery is even possible
